title: S Jaishankar To Travel To Pak, Last Foreign Minister Visit Was In 2015
content: India on Friday announced that External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar will travel to Pakistan to attend a conclave of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) in mid-October.
summary: India on Friday announced that External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar will travel to Pakistan to attend a conclave of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) in mid-October.

title: Our Allies In The Region Would Keep Fighting Israel: Iran's Supreme Leader
content: Iran's supreme leader vowed in a rare address on Friday that his allies around the region would keep fighting Israel, as he defended his country's missile strike on its arch-foe.
summary: Iran's supreme leader vowed in a rare address on Friday that his allies around the region would keep fighting Israel, as he defended his country's missile strike on its arch-foe.

title: "India Must Convince Israel": Iran's Ambassador To NDTV On West Asia Crisis
content: As the conflict in West Asia is poised to set off a series of dangerous escalations risking full-scale war between Iran and Israel, Iran's Ambassador to India Iraj Elahi today sought India's intevention to help bring stability to the region.
summary: As the conflict in West Asia is poised to set off a series of dangerous escalations risking full-scale war between Iran and Israel, Iran's Ambassador to India Iraj Elahi today sought India's intevention to help bring stability to the region.

title: Maldives President's 1st Bilateral Visit To India From Sunday
content: Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu will be visiting India from October 6 to 10, the foreign ministry said today.
summary: Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu will be visiting India from October 6 to 10, the foreign ministry said today.

title: Russia Decides To Remove Taliban From Terrorist Groups List: Report
content: Russia's Foreign Ministry said on Friday that a decision to remove the Taliban from a list of terrorist organisations had been "taken at the highest level", the state TASS news agency reported on Friday.
summary: Russia's Foreign Ministry said on Friday that a decision to remove the Taliban from a list of terrorist organisations had been "taken at the highest level", the state TASS news agency reported on Friday.

title: Opinion: Who - And What - Will Fill The Vacuum In Iran's Resistance Axis?
content: History is littered with examples of how non-state militant actors, driven by ideology, are easily able to bulldoze their way to power before regional or international consensus-led political alternatives even start materialising.
summary: History is littered with examples of how non-state militant actors, driven by ideology, are easily able to bulldoze their way to power before regional or international consensus-led political alternatives even start materialising.

title: Australian Court Orders Musk's X To Pay $418,000 Fine In Child Abuse Case
content: An Australian court upheld an order on Friday for Elon Musk's X to pay a fine of A$610,500 ($418,000) for failing to cooperate with a regulator's request for information about anti-child-abuse practices.
summary: An Australian court upheld an order on Friday for Elon Musk's X to pay a fine of A$610,500 ($418,000) for failing to cooperate with a regulator's request for information about anti-child-abuse practices.

title: "Hezbollah Not Terrorists, People Are Hezbollah": Lebanon's Envoy To NDTV
content: It is the right of every nation which comes under occupation to resist the occupation, said Lebanon's Ambassador to India Rabie Narsh, speaking to NDTV about the ongoing and escalating conflict in West Asia.
summary: It is the right of every nation which comes under occupation to resist the occupation, said Lebanon's Ambassador to India Rabie Narsh, speaking to NDTV about the ongoing and escalating conflict in West Asia.

title: "Israel Won't Last Long": Iran's Khamenei's First Public Sermon In 5 Years
content: Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said Israel "won't last long" as he backed the Palestinian and Lebanese movements against Israelin his rare Friday sermon.
summary: Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said Israel "won't last long" as he backed the Palestinian and Lebanese movements against Israelin his rare Friday sermon.

title: Scientists Reveal It Wasn't Just One Asteroid That Wiped Out Dinosaurs
content: The massive asteroid that ended the dinosaurs 66 million years ago was not an isolated event, new research has revealed.
summary: The massive asteroid that ended the dinosaurs 66 million years ago was not an isolated event, new research has revealed.

title: WHO Approves First Diagnostic Test For Mpox Amid Rising Outbreaks In Africa
content: The UN health agency said on Friday that it had approved the use of the first diagnostic test for mpox, a key tool in countries battling outbreaks.
summary: The UN health agency said on Friday that it had approved the use of the first diagnostic test for mpox, a key tool in countries battling outbreaks.

title: Kamala Harris vs Donald Trump: US Election Broken Down By Numbers
content: Swing states, electoral college votes, candidates up and down the ballot, and millions of potential voters: here is the US election, broken down by numbers.
summary: Swing states, electoral college votes, candidates up and down the ballot, and millions of potential voters: here is the US election, broken down by numbers.

title: Explained: How Israel Might Strike Back At Iran
content: Israel has sworn it will retaliate for Iran's missile barrage on Tuesday, which involved more than 180 ballistic missiles and was largely thwarted by Israel's air defense systems.
summary: Israel has sworn it will retaliate for Iran's missile barrage on Tuesday, which involved more than 180 ballistic missiles and was largely thwarted by Israel's air defense systems.

title: Explained: The Implications of Iran's Military Barrage On Israel
content: Israel has sworn it will retaliate for Iran's missile barrage on Tuesday, which involved more than 180 ballistic missiles and was largely thwarted by Israel's air defense systems.

title: "Bibi Bugged My Bathroom": Boris Johnson's Big Claim Against Netanyahu
content: Former UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson claimed that a listening device was found in his bathroom after Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu used the facility during their meeting in 2017.
summary: Former UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson claimed that a listening device was found in his bathroom after Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu used the facility during their meeting in 2017.

title: Meet Kenya's DJ Boboss, Whose Music Is Crafted With Household Items
content: A spoon, some towel hooks, a piece of kettle and a plastic cap -- that's all you'll need to make a mixing deck if you have the technical and musical skills of DJ Boboss.
summary: A spoon, some towel hooks, a piece of kettle and a plastic cap -- that's all you'll need to make a mixing deck if you have the technical and musical skills of DJ Boboss.

title: Yazidi Woman Taken As ISIS Slave At Age 11 Rescued After 10 Years
content: A Yazidi woman who was kidnapped by ISIS terrorists at age 11 and then held by Hamas for a decade has been rescued by Israeli forces in Gaza after a months-long operation led by the US, officials said.
summary: A Yazidi woman who was kidnapped by ISIS terrorists at age 11 and then held by Hamas for a decade has been rescued by Israeli forces in Gaza after a months-long operation led by the US, officials said.

title: "Today's Ukraine Could Be Tomorrow's East Asia": Newly Elected Japan PM
content: Japan's new Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba warned in his first policy speech Friday that "today's Ukraine could be tomorrow's East Asia" while also dubbing the country's low birth rate a "quiet emergency".
summary: Japan's new Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba warned in his first policy speech Friday that "today's Ukraine could be tomorrow's East Asia" while also dubbing the country's low birth rate a "quiet emergency".

title: Opinion: Israel Should Stop Fantasising About A 'Regime Change' In Iran
content: The Iranian regime is not going anywhere in a hurry, nor is its worldview going to change. The only change that might come would be in the shape of its capabilities.
summary: The Iranian regime is not going anywhere in a hurry, nor is its worldview going to change. The only change that might come would be in the shape of its capabilities.

title: Why Days Get Longer In Summer And Shorter In Winter
content: The days are getting longer and in Australia, the switch to daylight saving time is almost upon us (for about 70% of the population, anyway).
summary: The days are getting longer and in Australia, the switch to daylight saving time is almost upon us (for about 70% of the population, anyway).
